official_title: A bill to increase the rates of duty on certain tobacco and to prohibit the payment of substitution drawback with respect to imports of such tobacco.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the duty on certain tobacco. Prohibits the payment of substitution drawback (refund of import duties upon exportation of articles manufactured in the United States from imported materials) with respect to such tobacco.

titles.title: A bill to increase the rates of duty on certain tobacco and to prohibit the payment of substitution drawback with respect to imports of such tobacco.
